title: 怎么自定义村民交换物品
author: xxzy159
txt_content: 想做一个RPG地图 需要搞村民 不知道怎么自定义

replies.author: david_yg
replies.txt_content: 尝试使用一下命令编辑器，论坛上有很多~（我真不知道SUM指令怎么用{:10_493:}）

replies.author: interend
replies.txt_content:
/summon Villager x y z {Attributes:[{Base:20.00,Name:generic.maxHealth},{Base:0,Name:generic.knockbackResistance},{Base:0.50,Name:generic.movementSpeed},{Base:16.00,Modifiers:[{UUIDMost:3929899570033805893,UUIDLeast:-5496542851277510022,Amount:-0.04,Operation:1,Name:Random spawn bonus}],Name:generic.followRange}],Motion:[0,-0.08,0],Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:7,buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},uses:0},{maxUses:7,buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},uses:0},{maxUses:7,buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},uses:0},{maxUses:7,buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},uses:0},{maxUses:7,buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},uses:0}]},Rotation:[111.22,-31.12],Profession:1}



buy:id:后面加购买东西的ID
sell:id:后面加村民卖东西的ID
maxUses:后面加出售的最大次数
